Author: team10go
Text: thanks for the advice.. i’m feeling a little better now. My boyfriend got home and was able to offer a little bit of comfort but now i’m just more mad about undoing all the progress i’ve been working on.

Author: tea-addicted-taemint
Text: I relate to that feeling of guilt... I do have some post purge tips that are mostly harm reduction... drink a little water, eat a bit of nutrient dense food like banana or potato that has potassium in it, and may be have some tea or electrolyte solution as well....you'll probably be tired, give yourself permission to relax and do basic self care like cleaning yourself and resting... you're gonna be ok op <3
